title: accounts.response
description: Response for retrieving a list of accounts that the tenant SSO login has access to in the vendor's system.

errorCode.description: Error code returned from the vendor's API, if any

callBackInfo.description: Optional callback information to be used in the next request. Only present if a callback is needed

accounts.description: List of accounts that the SSO login has access to

shouldCallback.description: Controls whether another request should be made

values.description:
Generic object to be passed to the next request
Used for passing data between chained requests

VendorAccountDto.description: Model representing a customer's vendor account

postalCode.description: Postal code associated with vendor accountId

includeAccount.description:
Logic to determine whether the account should be added as a subAccount for customer
This should be true if the main accountId can be used for ordering or getting pricing

accounts.description:
List of subAccounts associated with the customer's vendor account
SubAccounts can be used for ordering or getting pricing

vendorIdentifiers.description: A collection of identifiers specific to the Vendor, which will be passed back to the vendor on all subsequent calls for this account

VendorSubAccountDto.description: Model representing a customer's vendor subAccount associated with their vendor account

postalCode.description: Postal Code associated with the subAccount

customFields.description: Any custom fields to display to user for this subAccount

vendorIdentifiers.description: A map of identifiers specific to the Vendor, which will be passed back to the vendor on subsequent calls
